description:
cmd/gc, cmd/ld: use go.weak instead of weak as the weak symbol prefix

Also defend our symbol prefixes (now just "go" and "type")
from use as import paths.

Fixes issue 4257.

messages.text:

cmd/gc, cmd/ld: use go.weak instead of weak as the weak symbol prefix

Also defend our symbol prefixes (now just "go" and "type")
from use as import paths.

Fixes issue 4257.
